name: Apologies: From The Void
description:
***While we understand this wont be used for judging purposes, anyone wanting to play the working version of our game should check this link. It addresses the bug where a path is not created to the player on map regeneration. https://whiffkin.itch.io/gmtk-bug-fix***

A cosmic spin on a classic apologetic board game. 

Navigate your ships using your navigation computer, avoiding the dangerous asteroids! Be the first to get all your ships to the space station to win.

GMTK submission 2022 - Theme: Roll of the Dice

- Apologies uses a random, however focused, path creation algorithm to simulate  a nav computer path-finding the player ships through an asteroid field. 

- Uses physical dice objects to calculate map change algorithm function calls
